subject: Re: [R] Loop for test statistic
body:
Please read the posting guide. How shall we know what ycf, and A2 are?
In general, the condition should be something like (.0032 I would like to obtain the statistic of A2 for ycf between the value 0.0032
> and 0.09, and I am using the following codes. 
> 
> while (0.0032  A2 <- A2_GOFlaio(ycf, dist="GEV")[1]
> print(A2)
> }
> 
> Could anyone give me some advice as it does not work.
> 
> Many thanks.

-- 
Petr Klasterecky
Dept. of Probability and Statistics
Charles University in Prague
Czech Republic

______________________________________________
R-help@stat.math.ethz.ch mailing list
https://stat.ethz.ch/mailman/listinfo/r-help
PLEASE do read the posting guide http://www.R-project.org/posting-guide.html
and provide commented, minimal, self-contained, reproducible code.
